info.name: High Contrast for Google+ (2012-05-16)
info.description: Forces the Google+ content text to be pure black, and the page background to be a lighter shade of gray.
info.additionalInfo:
Please Note:

If you have issues with this script, please let me know in comments here, or come over to the Google+ thread where I announced this script and comment there.

Version history:

  • 2012-05-15: Initial release to the public.
  • 2012-05-15.2: Added one more style tweak for non-home streams.
  • 2012-05-16: Another background color nitpick.
